dc0f6530-1570-4deb-a147-5f02c3abe722.description: This 3.5 day introductory course is designed to familiarize new users with TruSight™ Oncology 500 through detailed hands-on instruction. Participants will learn all essential steps in the TruSight Oncology 500 workflow, including sample and library preparation, enrichment, sequencing, and data analysis.
dc0f6530-1570-4deb-a147-5f02c3abe722.name: TruSight™ Oncology 500 (DNA/RNA)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed training course and demonstrated an understanding of the library prep workflow by completing assay preparation in the lab.

1156814e-99dc-4e7a-b512-1c620cf602eb.description: iSeq™ 100 system install and hands-on instruction to familiarize users with Illumina sequencing technology and the iSeq workflow. This one-day course provides hands-on training in iSeq run set-up and operation, and run monitoring.
1156814e-99dc-4e7a-b512-1c620cf602eb.name: iSeq™ 100 Sequencing System Training

beab579f-5ff6-4f74-bb01-3a13c95611ca.description: The course provides instruction on the Illumina COVIDSeq Test product overview, laboratory setup, assay workflow, sequencing, and data analysis for Research Use Only.
beab579f-5ff6-4f74-bb01-3a13c95611ca.name: Illumina COVIDSeq™ Test Training (RUO)

badge_template_activities.title: Completed training course and demonstrated an understanding of the library prep workflow by completing assay preparation in the lab.

7a872164-65b2-4732-b4a6-db06414f1d32.description: A 1.5-day onsite training for the complete Illumina DNA Prep Enrichment (formerly Nextera Flex for Enrichment) library preparation workflow, with detailed hands-on instruction. Participants will learn all steps of the workflow including sample and library preparation, enrichment, quality control, best practices, and troubleshooting, in addition to training on Illumina-supported sequencing and data analysis tools specific to the DNA Prep for Enrichment workflow.
7a872164-65b2-4732-b4a6-db06414f1d32.name: Illumina DNA Prep with Enrichment

badge_template_activities.title: Completed training course and demonstrated an understanding of the library prep workflow by completing assay preparation in the lab.

0ea6ea3d-6600-4b05-8bfc-70f7ba220515.description: One-day training for quantification and quality control of genomic DNA, checking library quality and quantity and training of the complete DNA Prep workflow (formerly known as Nextera DNA Flex).
0ea6ea3d-6600-4b05-8bfc-70f7ba220515.name: Illumina DNA Prep

badge_template_activities.title: Completed training course and demonstrated an understanding of the library prep workflow by completing assay preparation in the lab.

74ed02df-df39-4702-8a3a-e96734b22bc7.description: This course provides a high-level overview of a comprehensive sequencing workflow including comparison of traditional methods used in pathology labs with NGS approach; outline of different NGS strategies, sample preparation methods and sequencing instruments; experimental design considerations for FFPE samples; introduction to NGS data analysis. Training is delivered in 3x 3-4h sessions.
74ed02df-df39-4702-8a3a-e96734b22bc7.name: Introduction to Next-Generation Sequencing: Molecular Pathology

badge_template_activities.title: Completed course virtually online or in-person at an Illumina Solution Center, where they demonstrated an understanding of the entire sequencing workflow by applying learning to knowledge & tool-based exercises.

88377030-955f-41a4-b3ad-011654ae7771.description: MiSeq™ Sequencing System two day hands-on instruction to familiarize users with Illumina sequencing technology and the MiSeq workflow. This course provides hands-on training in MiSeq run set-up and operation, and run monitoring.
88377030-955f-41a4-b3ad-011654ae7771.name: MiSeq™ Sequencing System Training

1c1e9746-5df6-474c-bedc-fe2a1d34d842.description: NextSeq™ 500/550 Sequencing System three day hands-on instruction to familiarize users with Illumina sequencing technology and the NextSeq workflow. This course provides hands-on training in NextSeq run set-up and operation, and run monitoring.

badge_template_activities.title: Completed training course and demonstrated an understanding of sequencing technology and workflow by applying learning to hands-on exercises in the lab.

904da0ef-cf81-43de-8aeb-a1054031e2b9.description: In this training the customer will find out how to evaluate quality of sequencing data, what data format is needed to start secondary analysis and how to manipulate fastq files in order to improve alignment. Participants will learn what happens during secondary analysis, what metrics are generated during this process, sample and lab processes, and how to identify important variants. The training is introductory but basic knowledge of the sequencing workflow would be recommended.
904da0ef-cf81-43de-8aeb-a1054031e2b9.name: Introduction to Data Analysis

badge_template_activities.title: Completed course virtually online and demonstrated an understanding of sequencing data, secondary & tertiary analysis and by applying learning in scenario-based exercises.

7f9f50ba-089d-4c76-ba53-19adf1286fd2.description: NovaSeq™ 6000 Sequencing System three day hands-on instruction to familiarize users with Illumina sequencing technology and the NovaSeq 6000 workflow. 7f9f50ba-089d-4c76-ba53-19adf1286fd2.name: NovaSeq™ 6000 Sequencing System Training

4619a268-2561-4b6f-aecd-6f819b018fa7.description: Official Illumina Connected Analytics (ICA) Implementation Partners are technical service providers that have been officially recognized by Illumina to help customers build solutions using ICA. Each partner has been selected and onboarded to ICA and to provide either bioinformatics, data science and software development expertise and services.
4619a268-2561-4b6f-aecd-6f819b018fa7.name: Official Illumina Connected Analytics Implementation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Each ICA implementation partner has undergone candidate evaluations and selection based on skillsets, experience and fit focused on Bioinformatics, Data Science and Software Development
Trained and evaluated on ICA in addition to ongoing product access and content for continued learning
Alignment on handoffs and engagement structures are prerequisites to join the program to enable customer success on ICA.

2ddd4fbc-80c8-4931-9dad-9527480bc7a9.description: Illumina Connected Analytics (ICA) Training and Onboarding includes five (5) hours of product onboarding support and product training delivered virtually.
2ddd4fbc-80c8-4931-9dad-9527480bc7a9.name: Illumina Connected Analytics (ICA) Training and Onboarding

badge_template_activities.title: Completed software training and onboarding course and demonstrated an understanding of bioinformatics, data management and analysis.

1ba039e8-edb7-411e-8f07-c106ee6885cf.description: This virtual course is an introduction to Illumina sequencing technology and its possible applications for new customers. During (3) 3.5 hr. online sessions offered over the course of 3 days (total 10.5 hrs.), customers will get an overview of each step of a sequencing workflow; from considerations for experimental design, choice of sample preparation method and sequencer, to challenges of data analysis.
1ba039e8-edb7-411e-8f07-c106ee6885cf.name: Introduction to Next-Generation Sequencing: DNA

badge_template_activities.title: Completed course virtually online or in-person at an Illumina Solution Center, where they demonstrated an understanding of the entire sequencing workflow by applying learning to case studies and scenario-based exercises.

596b94ac-ca5e-402a-8e3f-a8f9ad8b427c.description: Virtual course provides a high level overview of complete RNA NGS workflows (sample prep, sequencers and data analysis) with a focus on experimental design specific to RNA and everything that you should consider to be successful in NGS. Training is delivered in 3x 3-4h sessions.
596b94ac-ca5e-402a-8e3f-a8f9ad8b427c.name: Introduction to Next-Generation Sequencing: RNA

badge_template_activities.title: Completed course virtually online or in-person at an Illumina Solution Center, where they demonstrated an understanding of the entire sequencing workflow by applying learning to case studies and scenario-based exercises.

92c5e540-c403-434d-a3c9-c8c4ca5809c5.description: High level overview of NGS workflow for microbiologists. The content of the training covers different application in NGS where NGS could have an advantage, with a particular focus on WGS and 16S. However, depending on customer interests, other applications like e.g. viral surveillance may be covered to some extent as well. Training is delivered in 3x 3-4h sessions.
92c5e540-c403-434d-a3c9-c8c4ca5809c5.name: Introduction to Next-Generation Sequencing: Microbiology

badge_template_activities.title: Completed course virtually online or in-person at an Illumina Solution Center, where they demonstrated an understanding of the entire sequencing workflow by applying learning to case studies and scenario-based exercises.

6c13188f-d54b-44e0-935f-23ae5f010ee2.description: 1 day on-site training for the complete AmpliSeq™ for Illumina DNA library preparation workflow. This training can be delivered with any of the available AmpliSeq™ for Illumina DNA panels. Includes quantification of DNA input as well as best practices, troubleshooting tips, and training on Illumina-supported analysis tools specific to the DNA application workflow.
6c13188f-d54b-44e0-935f-23ae5f010ee2.name: AmpliSeq™ for Illumina DNA Library Preparation Kit Training
